snippet: The broadcast networks took an all-hands-on-deck approach to the first night of February sweeps on Thursday and gave television viewers a full slate of new content.
abstract: The broadcast networks took an all-hands-on-deck approach to the first night of February sweeps on Thursday and gave television viewers a full slate of new content.

headline.main: 'Big Bang' on CBS Holds On Despite Fox's 'Idol' Comeback
